channel.title: eleken
channel.description: At Eleken, we dive deep into the world of SaaS design, sharing practical insights, strategies, and stories from the frontlines of product development. Whether you’re a startup founder, a product manager, or a design enthusiast, our blog is your go-to resource for mastering UI/UX principles and applying them to create intuitive, user-friendly SaaS products. We simplify complex concepts, explore the latest trends, and provide actionable advice that you can implement right away.

item.title: Freemium Pricing: Customer Acquisition Hero or Revenue Killer?
item.description: How to decide whether freemium pricing is the right business model for your SaaS, freemium pitfalls, and questions to answer before going freemium.

item.title: Top 8 Healthcare UX Challenges: Why Is It So Hard to Make Good Software in Healthcare?
item.description: Healthtech is going through a period of rapid growth. Find out the main challenges of user experience in healthcare.
